snippet: Mia, age 7, wears only boys' clothes, but Grandma sends pink, frills and fluff.
abstract: Mia, age 7, wears only boys' clothes, but Grandma sends pink, frills and fluff.
lead_paragraph: Grandparents, and in particular the grandparents on the "in-law" side, can provide a nearly endless series of quandaries for some parents. The lucky ones among us have two charming sets who support us in all things parental and offer our children the best grandparenting going. Most of us (among those fortunate enough to have our parents around at all) would name at least one or two areas where we're not quite sure how to navigate all these familial relationships. Gretchen (her name, and her daughter's, have been changed) falls into that category.

headline.main: Parental Quandary: Grandma Gives Girly Gifts to a Tomboy
